meanings.definition: A sleeveless garment worn as an undershirt.
meanings.sent1: He wore a white singlet under his dress shirt.
meanings.sent2: The athlete put on a clean singlet before the race.
meanings.sent3: The singlet was so comfy, he wished he could wear it all day.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite singlet was like a soft hug around her torso.
meanings.sent5: The bright red singlet stood out in the sea of uniforms.

meanings.definition: A particle with a net spin of 0.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the singlet in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: In quantum mechanics, a singlet is a unique particle.
meanings.sent3: The singlet particle seemed to dance around the others in the simulation.
meanings.sent4: The singlet's behavior was unlike any other particle in the study.
meanings.sent5: The singlet's spin of 0 made it a fascinating subject for research.

meanings.definition: A type of wrestling match involving one wrestler from each team.
meanings.sent1: The crowd cheered as the wrestlers entered the ring for the singlet match.
meanings.sent2: In a singlet match, only one wrestler competes from each side.
meanings.sent3: The singlet match ended in a surprising victory for the underdog wrestler.
meanings.sent4: The intensity of the singlet match kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The singlet match showcased the skill and determination of the wrestlers.
